title: Tennessee teen Savannah Leigh Pruitt found safe after 19 days missing, adoptive dad jailed
itunes:title: Tennessee teen Savannah Leigh Pruitt found safe after 19 days missing, adoptive dad jailed
description:
Savannah Leigh Pruitt returned home to Tennessee Friday, nearly three weeks after disappearing. The 14-year-old was found safe in Wisconsin Thursday, the same day her adoptive father was arrested on a rape charge. Nancy looks at the investigation with Cold Case Research Institute director Sheryl McCollum, private investigator Vincent Hil,  Atlanta criminal lawyer Darryl Cohen, Los Angeles psycho analyst Dr. Bethany Marshall, and Crime Stories reporter Robyn Walensky.l

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
